ALLERGEN_INFO_TEXT: The dishes and products indicated may have circumstantial changes or substitutions on some of our flights. The food offered may contain allergens for some passengers with some type of intolerance or allergy, including traces. It is passenger´s responsibility  to carry the appropriate medication and any other protective measures that may be required during the flight.
